attributes.action: Make all the BBC Channels Pay Per View, and Scrap the TV Licence
attributes.additional_details:
You would not be happy if you was automatically signed up to ALL the Sport and Film channels without your consent.
But the BBC sign you up without asking you, and charge you £147 license fee.
Why does the BBC get to decide what programs you like? 
That's unfair.
Maybe you prefer to watch other things.
Putting £147 a year back in your pocket if you choose watch other channels. Are you willing to pay £12.25 per month for the BBC? 

At least your have the choice - if you sign the petition.
attributes.background:
We all pay some type of TV subscription unless you have Freeview, and choose to just get the Free channels supported by Adverts.
I would like the choice, to choose if I want to pay to watch 'The BBC' channels. Make the BBC Pay per view, and let us choose to pay.
